name: Blossoming Fields
description:
Blossoming Fields

Made in 2 days on the side during the International College Jam #1. 

Theme: "Walk on the Wild Side"

Diversifiers: Flower Power, Skills are to be Learned, Everything can break.

A short romantic adventure game, where you play as a flower, trying to find your lost loved one.

READ the "Story/"How to Play" section in the menu before starting, story is written there :)

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • G to Hide/Show in grassy areas and pots

Goal:

  • Get to the end. look out for hazards and people on the way
